title: Qualcomm Associate Engineer Compensation - Hyderabad, India
content:
Education: B.Tech in Tier-2 College
Years of Experience: 6 months
Prior Experience: Samsung
Previous Salary : Rs. 13,00,000
Date of the Offer: Dec 2022
Company: Qualcomm
Title/Level: Associate Engineer
Location: Hyderabad, india
Salary: Rs. 13.5 Lakhs
Relocation: Rs. 50,000
Signing Bonus: Rs. 1,00,000
Stock bonus: $ 10,000 = Rs. 8,00,000 for 3 years
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 8% of salary every year
Total comp 1st year (Salary + Bonus + Stock):  ~ Rs. 18,00,000
Benefits: 18 paid vacation days + 12 sick leave/ casual days

Work Life balance is Average, Pay is decent. All the best  :)

title: INCREFF | QA Engineer | Bangalore (Hybrid)
content:

Branch: Non Circuital
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: No Interns
Date of the Offer: August 2022
Date of Joining: June 2023
Company: Increff
Title/Level: QA Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Base Salary: 10.50 L
Relocation: upto 40k
Signing Bonus: 50k
Retension Bonus: 1 L
RSU's: After completing 1 year (Not clearly mentioned)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 10% of ctc (around 1.25 L)

Benefits:
Total 30 paid leaves out of which 15 are privilege leaves
In office lunch
Alternate week WFH
Medical Insurance upto 5L
Accomodation and Flight reimbursment for upto 2 dependent family members at joining
